Articles.Content:
Yep. I think there should be bigger engines that the mainsail, something like the F1 engine on the Saturn V.

I sometime (amazingly) find the mainsail not powerful enough.

If they add a larger engine I think it should require it's own special fuel tank. Or something to that effect to make it harder. Just adding something bigger feels like a bit of a cheat. It should have it's own cons.

that being said, i've sent some rockets that start close to 2000T at launch. what are you sending that needs a larger engine?
Lol I tried sending up a massive duna lander with a huge transfer stage in one go... which didn't work at all.
I've sent a duna mission in one go and it didnt require an enormous engine. Maybe you just need to think smaller?
It would just be nice to have an enormous engine...
